familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $15,001 - $50,000 in Rent or Royalties income from WESTMIN MAD ASSOCIATES, L.L.C. (Commercial Real Estate in New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: WESTMIN MAD ASSOCIATES, L.L.C. (Commercial Real Estate in New York, NY)
